Youth AI Programs

Empower the next generation with AI skills. Our comprehensive programs are designed for young minds aged 15-29 to explore, learn, and innovate with artificial intelligence.

Available Programs

AI Fundamentals for Young Minds

beginner

An introductory course that demystifies AI concepts and explores how artificial intelligence impacts daily life.

4-weeks
Age 15-18
12-15 participants
Hybrid
Apply

Python for AI Development

intermediate

Learn Python programming specifically for AI applications, including libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and scikit-learn.

6-weeks
Age 16-22
10-12 participants
In-person
Apply

AI Innovation Challenge

advanced

An intensive program for developing AI solutions to real-world problems, with mentorship from industry experts.

8-weeks
Age 18-25
8-10 participants
Hybrid
Apply

AI Ethics & Society

intermediate

Explore the ethical implications of AI technology and learn to develop responsible AI solutions.

3-weeks
Age 17-24
15-20 participants
Online

Ready to Start Your AI Journey?

Join hundreds of young Armenians who are already building the future with AI. Apply today and be part of the next generation of AI innovators.

Apply NowMeet Our Mentors

AI4ALL Armenia

Democratizing AI education in Armenia by empowering youth (15-29) and teachers across all regions with essential AI skills. An initiative by the Enterprise Incubator Foundation (EIF) and USAID.

In partnership with:
